1.content:
Looking around frantically, I tried to think my way out of this situation, like always. That's when I realized;
" he needed me alive if he wanted to go forward with his crazy plan."
So instead I calmed down and looked around. I was hurdling through the most colorful tunnel in the world, it had colors so bright all the way to so dark, with so much in between, I didn't know how to feel. That's when I looked down to check my own amenities.
1.title: Where am I?

133.content:
As I saw him I reached out, trying to touch him. That's when my vision was filled up with so much light, till...

"Hey, dummy. You gonna wake up for breakfast?" Kieran said whilst slapping my face playfully.

"Give me a minute, I'm waking up from a really strange dream." I said groggily.

"Oh, do tell!" Kieran pried.

"I cant remember a thing except for the fact that my body hurts for no god damned reason." I rubbed my side to ease the pain.

"Hey! As long as you're in my house, you follow my rules, no swearing. Now get up and get some more clothes on then your pajamas." He said to me as he walked out. I slipped myself out of bed and walked to the window. Looking outside, I saw the menacing office towers touching the heavens and the streets where everyday people and pokémon walked. And in between I saw flying pokémon deliver goods that people had ordered like food. I spied through the morning crowd, trying to find my favorite pokémon...
133.title: Friend

info.brief_description: A story of a lost soul not knowing more.
info.description: After and intense battle, our hero wakes up not remembering what happened but instead remembering a whole different life.
